content: 45 minutes beanie ©crochet pattern by @ra in crochet 45 minutes beanie - yarn for this pattern i recommend to use drops snow 100% wool by drops design you can use also another yarn of group e with this weight/length 50g- 50m 55yds for your beanie you need about 100g of the materials same or different colors - hook 9mm - needle - scissors - tape measure gauge 10x10 cm 4 in x 4 in = 9hdc x 7rows ©crochet pattern by @ra in crochet 45 minutes beanie chain chain half_double_crochet half_double_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch st stitch/stitches abbreviations *----* repeat instructions from* to* as many times as stated bphdc back post half_double_crochet fphdc front post half_double_crochet single_crochet single stitch this beanie fits an adult sizing the final circumference is 54cm 21 25 in the final height is approx 20cm 7 87 in ©crochet pattern by @ra in crochet 45 minutes beanie chain 3 and slip_stitch in the first chain to make a ring start 1ch 9hdc in the center of the ring slip_stitch into the first half_double_crochet 9st the first chain doesn t count as a round stitch in every round 1 1ch 2hdc in every st of the previous round slip_stitch round into the first half_double_crochet 18st 2 1ch 2hdc in the first st *half_double_crochet 2hdc half_double_crochet* until the round end slip_stitch into the first half_double_crochet 26st 3 ©crochet pattern by @ra in crochet 45 minutes beanie 1ch 2hdc in the first st *half_double_crochet half_double_crochet 2hdc* until the round end slip_stitch into the first half_double_crochet 35st 4 1ch 2hdc in the first st *half_double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet 2hdc* round until the end slip_stitch into the first half_double_crochet 44st 5 1ch half_double_crochet in every st of the previous round slip_stitch rounds into the first half_double_crochet 44st 6-8 1ch half_double_crochet in third loop only in every st of the round previous round slip_stitch into the first half_double_crochet 44st 9 ©crochet pattern by @ra in crochet 45 minutes beanie 1ch half_double_crochet in every st of the previous round slip_stitch round into the first half_double_crochet 44st 10 1ch half_double_crochet in third loop only in every st of the round previous round slip_stitch into the first half_double_crochet 44st 11 1ch alternate hdcfp hdcbp in every st of the rounds previous round slip_stitch into the first half_double_crochet 44st 12-13 1ch single_crochet in third loop only in every st of the rounds previous round slip_stitch into the first single_crochet 44st 14-15 ©crochet pattern by @ra in crochet 45 minutes beanie your beanie is ready to go out into the wild 45 minutes beanie round round start 1 2 round round rounds 4 5 6-8 ©crochet pattern by @ra in crochet 45 minutes beanie round rounds 9 12-13 half_double_crochet in third loop only alternate hdcfp hdcbp this pattern and photographs are property of raffaella invernizzi ra in crochet no reproduction or distribution of this
